title: Internet Archive Faces Uphill Battle in Lawsuit Over Its Free Digital Library
description:
A federal judge heard oral arguments in a lawsuit filed by four major book publishers against Internet Archive for alleged copyright infringement on Monday. The lawsuit was first filed in 2020 and could be a landmark case when it comes to digital libraries and copyright.

title: The Daniels' Post-Oscars Project Could Be in the Star Wars Galaxy
description:

It says that Daniel Kwan and Daniel Scheinert, the Oscar-winning directors of the Best Picture-winning Everything Everywhere All at Once, directed an episode of the upcoming Star Wars Disney+ show, Star Wars: Skeleton Crew.

title: OpenAI Says Stonemasons Should Be Fine in the Brave New World
description:

description:

description:

title: The BBC, Which Has 4 Million Followers on TikTok, Tells Employees Not to Download TikTok
description:

description:

description:

description:

title: ‘Rapidly Closing Window of Opportunity’ to Reverse Climate Change, Major Scientific Body Finds
description:
